history.content: Assuming you're in LSCS: You are given this option when you first access telebears. If you missed it, you will need to submit a paper petition at 206 Evans Hall. This can be found in the lobby or here. Please wait until the Spring semester has started to submit this.

Hi!

I just wanted to know how to add myself to the degree list for Spring 2016? I see the link at the bottom on Telebears but its grayed out, and I can't click it!

Thanks!
history.subject: How do I add myself to the degree list for Spring 2016?

history.content:
